# dynamic_config

The `DynamicConfig` class for LLM dynamic configuration.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/dynamic_config/index" symbolName="TypedDict" /> TypedDict

A simple typed namespace. At runtime it is equivalent to a plain dict.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/dynamic_config/index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="prompt_templates/dynamic_config/index" symbolName="DynamicConfig" /> DynamicConfig

Class for specifying dynamic configuration in a prompt template method.
